data.title: Assurant Appliance Warranty
data.meta_description: Assurant appliance warranty questions? Get answers to appliance and tools insurance claim inquiries from scheduling a repair to Service Protection Advantage.
data.text:
Receive an invitation to purchase an extended service plan? The Lowe’s Protection Plus site lets you securely purchase or renew your Lowe’s coverage online.

You may access My Account from this portal to see your coverage details, update your billing or payment information.

Also visit here to file a claim, schedule a repair, see terms and conditions or just to chat with us!

The Whirpool Extended Service Contracts site lets you purchase a plan, find out what’s covered under your plan and make payments. It also provides a form and contact info to schedule a service repair or find out more about your policy.

If you need to schedule a service repair, call 1-866-576-1660.

The Jenn-Air Extended Service Contracts site lets you purchase a plan, find out what’s covered under your plan and make payments. It also provides a form and contact info to schedule a service repair or find out more about your policy.

If you need to schedule a service repair, call 1-866-576-1660.

The Amana Extended Service Plans site lets you purchase a plan, find out what’s covered under your plan and make payments. It also provides a form and contact information to schedule a service repair or to find out more about your policy.

If you need to schedule a service repair, call 1-866-576-1660.

The Maytag Extended Service Plans site lets you purchase a plan, find out what’s covered under your plan and make payments. It also provides a form and contact information to schedule a service repair or to find out more about your policy.

If you need to schedule a service repair, call 1-866-576-1660.

We are here to help! We've made it easy for you to get the help you need.

Visit the schedule repair portal to find your service plan, schedule service and find more information.
